aboutDescription.message: Use this section to view information about this extension.

acceptTermsInputDescription.message: I have read and agree to the $termsOfUsageLink$ and $privacyPolicyLink$

accountActivated.message: Your account has been successfully activated!

accountAddressLabel.message: Your current account address. Share them to get money.

accountNameInputDescription.message: What will the new account be called?

activateAccountDescription.message: This may be required for ICO/funder or testnet faucet accounts.

activateAccountSecretDescription.message: 'Secret' field of funder account or faucet

addressBookDescription.message: Add, remove and manage your contacts.

addressInputDescriptionWithDomain.message: Address, ID or alias of the account

addressOfDeployedTokenContract.message: Address of a provided asset contract.

analyticsConfirmationCollectDescription.message: Anonymized click and page view events

analyticsConfirmationDescription.message: We are constantly improving Wallet and need your help. To better understand which section of the wallet should be updated, we collect anonymous usage data. This data is only used to improve the usability of  Wallet.

analyticsConfirmationNeverCollectDescrip.message: Your keys, addresses, transactions, balances, hashes, IP or other personal information.

analyticsConfirmationSettingsDescription.message: You can disable analytics tracking at any time in your wallet settings.

analyticsSettingsDescription.message: Here you can configure the sending of anonymous analyzes that help us to improve the product.

appDesc.message: Cryptocurrency wallet for the green Signum üçÄ blockchain as an extension for your browser.

appRequestsToSign.message: $origin$ asks you to confirm the transaction

appWouldLikeToConnectToYourWallet.message: $origin$ wants to connect to your wallet

backupedInputDescription.message:
And accept the risks that if I lose the phrase
my funds could be lost.

cantConnectToNetworkHint.message: Try selecting another node or check your internet connection.

clickIconToResetPermissions.message: Click the X icon to reset permissions.

clickOnCustomDerivationPath.message: Click 'Custom Derive Path' to customize it.

clickOnRecipientAccount.message: Click on the account you want to send money to.

clickToRevealOrEditField.message: Click here to view or edit this field

communityResourcesTitle.message: You can always find additional information about the Signum XT wallet or ask for help:

confirmTermsError.message: Cannot proceed without accepting the Terms of Service

contactWithTheSameAddressAlreadyExists.message: Contact with the same address already exists

counterErrorDescription.message:
You cannot perform the operation at the moment!
Please wait if your previous operation has been completed and try again.

createNewWalletDescription.message: Are you new to Signum and don't have a Signum wallet yet? Well then go! Let's create a new wallet

dAppsCheckmarkPrompt.message: Click the checkmark for $action$ to enable DApps interactions

dAppsDescription.message: In this section you can enable the ability to interact with decentralized applications.

dAppsListTvlDescription.message: Total locked. The value in SIGNA is the total amount of SIGNA locked in dApps. The value in USD is the total amount of SIGNA and tokens locked there.

decimalsInputDescription.message: A number of decimal places after the point. For example: 8 for BTC, 2 for USD.

defaultDerivationPathLabel.message: By default, the $path$ derivation is used.

deleteCollectibleConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this collectible?

deleteContactConfirm.message: Do you really want to delete this contact?

deleteNetworkConfirm.message: Do you really want to delete this node?

deleteNetworkHint.message: Click the X icon to delete the node. If you want to edit it, just delete it and add again with new parameters.

deleteTokenConfirm.message: Do you really want to delete this token?

derivationTypeFieldDescription.message: The elliptic curve that the account uses.

doNotSharePhrase.message: Do NOT share this phrase with ANYONE! It can be used to steal your credit.

domainDoesntResolveToAddress.message: Alias "$value$" could not be resolved to an address

emptyImplicitContract.message: Your account is empty. Deposit any amount of Tez into this account to activate it

enterPasswordToRemoveAccount.message: Enter the password to remove the account.

errorChangingAccountName.message: An error occurred while changing the account name

failedToResetExtension.message: The extension could not be reset: $errorMessage$

failureSecretMayBeInvalid.message: Failed. This can happen because the specified secret is invalid

feeInputDescription.message:
The minimum fee for this operation is: $fee$
Higher fees may speed up the confirmation.

firefoxLedgerConnectionError.message: $sorry$ The connection to the $device$ via $browser$ is temporarily $unavailable$.

generalSettingsDescription.message: Here you can manage the language settings and the display mode.

helpAndCommunityDescription.message: Use this section if you want to join our community or need help.

ifYouDontSeeYourAsset.message:
If you don't see your assets,
try to click $toClick$.

ifYouWantToActivateAnotherAccount.message: If you want to activate a different account, please select it in the top right drop-down list.

ifYouWantToRemoveAnotherAccount.message: If you want to remove another account, select it from the drop-down menu in the top right. You can always re-import the account. No data is lost.

importExistingWalletDescription.message: Already have a wallet? Import them with your passphrase

importNewAccountTitle.message: Recover account? Would you like to sign in with a different account?

incorrectTokenIdErrorMessage.message: Error processing asset with provided data. Make sure the asset ID is correct.

joinPrompt.message: Feel free to join and ask your questions

ledgerLiveBridgeGuide.message: To connect to the Ledger, please activate the Ledger Live application on your device, open the Tezos Wallet application and allow a WebSocket connection to your  account.

ledgerLiveSettingsDescription.message: The new Ledger Live Bridge lets you use your ledger in a different way.

ledgerNameInputDescription.message: What will the new Ledger account be called?

lockUpSettingsDescription.message: The extension will automatically lock after 5 minutes of inactivity.

lockedWalletAlreadyExists.message: Suspended wallet already exists. Importing a new one will replace the existing one.

mainAssetBalanceIsZero.message: Your balance is zero. Signa is required for the fee.

mayHappenBecauseYouAreOffline.message: This can happen because you are currently offline

minimalFeeGreaterThanBalance.message: The minimum fee for this transaction is higher than your balance.

minimalFeeGreaterThanBalanceVerbose.message: The minimum fee for this transaction is higher than your balance.

mustBeEqualToPasswordAbove.message: Must be the same as the password above

networksDescription.message: In this section you can add or delete custom Signum Nodes/Peers.

operationHistoryWhileMessage.message: Activity history is retrieved or processed

operationSuccessfullyAccepted.message: $type$ successfully accepted and waiting for confirmation!

passwordInputDescription.message: Used for additional mnemonic derivation. This is NOT a wallet password.

popupSettingsDescription.message: Here you can set whether the wallet should be opened in pop-up mode - i.e. at the top right of the browser - or as a whole page in the browser.

referredByTokenContractNotFound.message: The $address$ contract referenced by the token contract was not found.

removeAccountDescription.message: Use this section to remove your selected account.

resetExtensionConfirmation.message:
Are you sure you want to reset the wallet?
This will erase all your data locally.
You can import your active accounts again at any time.

resetPermissionsConfirmation.message: Do you want to reset permissions for $origin$?

revealNewSeedPhrase.message: Click below to view your new passphrase. Then, write that phrase down on a piece of paper and/or keep it in a safe place.

selectAnotherAssetPrompt.message: Click the area to select a different asset or token.

timedOutOperationConfirmation.message: Confirmation timed out. You can either wait longer or try again later.

tokenDoesNotMatchStandard.message: Assumed asset contract does not conform to $standard$ standard

tokenIdInputDescription.message: A non-negative integer that identifies the asset within the FA2 contract

tokenNameInputDescription.message: Asset name, e.g. 'Bitcoin' for BTC asset.

tokenSymbolInputDescription.message: Asset symbol, like 'USD' for US dollars.

tokenSymbolPatternDescription.message: Only a-z, A-Z, 0-9 characters allowed, 2-5 length

tokensRecepientInputDescription.message: Address or ID to send $assetSymbol$ to.

tokensRecepientInputDescriptionWithDomai.message: Address, ID or alias to send $assetSymbol$ to.

tryingToTransferToYourself.message:
You are trying to transfer money to yourself.
Please make sure it is exactly what you would like.

txIsLikelyToFail.message: Warning! Transaction is likely to fail

unableToEstimateTransactionAction.message: The transaction to the specified recipient cannot be estimated.

unableToSendTransactionAction.message: The transaction cannot be sent to the specified recipient.

unknownErrorCheckingSomeEntrypoint.message: An unknown error occurred while validating the entry point '$name$'.

unknownNetwork.message: The DApps requested network is unknown to the wallet. Please, add a network node first that belongs to '$networkName$' network

unknownParseErrorOccurred.message: An unknown parsing error has occurred.

unlockPasswordInputDescription.message: A password is used to protect the wallet.

unlockWalletPrompt.message: If you want to save something from an already existing wallet - $link$ and unlock it.

updateContactDescription.message:
To update an existing contact, simply remove them
and add it again with different names.

usePhoenixWallet.message: Use the Phoenix Mobile Wallet to process the code

verifySeedPhraseDescription.message: Fill in the blanks with the words to verify your passphrase

viewAccountAddressWarning.message: This website requests access to view your account address. Always make sure you trust the websites you interact with.

youWillNeedThisSeedPhrase.message: If you ever switch browsers or devices, you'll need this passphrase to access your accounts.

zeroCollectibleText.message:
You don't have any collectibles yet!
Good time to get one

addressBalanceDescription.message: After creating an account, you‚Äôll get an unique address ‚Äî your personal identifier in the Signum blockchain. You need this address to receive SIGNA and execute transactions, i.e. sending SIGNA, messages, interact with Smart Contracts, issue tokens, etc.

addressBalanceHint.message: The address is being represented as S-A1B2-... for main net or TS-A1B2-... for test net. If you acquired an alias name for your account it will be displayable also. Once you have a positive balance it shows up below your address.

howToStartDescription1.message: To start using your wallet and interacting with the Signum DApps ecosystem, the account balance must be positive, as each transaction costs you a low fee

howToStartDescription2.message: You can get SIGNA by buying on one of the exchanges, mining with hard drives, or by community engagements. Join us on Discord

howToStartHint.message: Also, you can copy your address and send coins to it from another wallet or Exchange. To copy the address, click on it on the main wallet screen or use "Receive".

tokensCollectibleDescription1.message: Your balances of FA1.2 and FA2 tokens are displayed on the ‚ÄúTokens‚Äù tab.

tokensCollectibleDescription2.message: You can send, check balances, or contract addresses of any token by clicking on it in this section.

tokensCollectibleHint.message: Your Non-Fungible Tokens (NFT) are displayed on the ‚ÄúCollectibles‚Äù tab. Here you can also interact with your own NFTs, see their full view, ID, and contract address.

profileRpcDescription.message: At the top of the interface, you can see your account icon. By clicking on it, you will open a menu with further actions, e.g. settings and account management.

profileRpcHint1.message:
Below your account name, you can see the ‚ÄúNetworks‚Äù selector, which allows you to select a node to which your wallet will be connected.
Main Net nodes are greenish, while Test Net Nodes have orange indicators. Test net nodes are for experimenting without using real money

profileRpcHint2.message: If your balance is not displayed, try changing the node.

profileRpcHint3.message: You can choose from a predefined list or add nodes manually in the Settings section

mixtureOfUppercaseAndLowercaseLetters.message: A mixture of both uppercase and lowercase letters.

mixtureOfLettersAndNumbers.message: A mixture of letters and numbers.

atLeast1SpecialCharacter.message: Inclusion of at least one special character, e.g., ! @ # ? ] - (optional, recommended).

browserVersionIsOutOfDate.message: Your browser version is out of date, we strongly recommend updating to the newest version!

congratsDescription2.message: Now you know about the basic and most important functions of the Signum XT wallet.

congratsDescription3.message: You can learn all features of the Wallet from our ‚ÄúEducational series‚Äù on YouTube.

congratsDescription4.message: Also, instructions and guides are available in our knowledge base.

congratsDescription5.message: Join our communities in Telegram and Discord.

networkIsTestnetDescription.message: Test networks do not carry any monetary value and are only for experimenting and/or development.

attentionDescription.message: Never, under any circumstances, disclose your private keys and seed phrase to any third party.

attentionListItem1.message: Your wallet can be targeted through a browser zero-day-exploit or via other malicious extension installed;

attentionListItem2.message: The screen can potentially be manipulated by malicious software installed in the system;

attentionListItem3.message: User‚Äôs host machine can be targeted by malware to steal encrypted wallet;

attentionListItem4.message: Choosing weak passwords can reduce the ability of a wallet to resist adversarial brute-forcing.

attentionListTitle2.message: To keep your assets safe, we recommend:

attentionListItem5.message: Move your funds from ‚Äúhot‚Äù wallet to ‚Äúcold‚Äù as soon as possible;

attentionListItem6.message: Use separate browsers for web-surfing and wallet‚Äôs operating;

attentionListItem7.message: Use one browser‚Äôs tab at a time to make transactions;

attentionListItem8.message: Keep the wallet locked when it is not in usage.

takeCare.message: Take care of your safety in the crypto world!

createWalletDescription.message: Create a Signum wallet account and you may:

createWalletDescriptionOption2.message: connect and interact with Signum DApps.

accountActivationAlertDescription.message: This account is not yet fully registered on the blockchain. Please activate your account to ensure its security and make it fully usable for all services, including exchanges.

accountActivationSuccessDescription.message: Welcome to Signum! If not already visible, you'll get an incoming activation transaction in a few moments.

attachmentDescription.message: You may attach some text or binary data to this transaction. Here you also enter the memo required by many exchanges

mustBeHexCode.message: Data must be a hexadecimal string

attachmentIsBinaryDescription.message: Binary data is encoded in hexadecimal form and mostly used for Smart Contract calls. Use this option only if you know what you are doing

wrongCurrentNetworkNode.message: Your currently selected node does not belong to the requested network: $networkName$. Please, select a correct node and retry

activationDescription1.message: Newly created accounts must be activated first for security reasons. It is not possible to send coins from exchanges to inactive accounts.

activationDescription2.message: If an account is inactive, the wallet will notify you and offer you to activate the account. Immediately after activation, you will receive a transaction that activates your account.

activationHint.message: Note that accounts only exist within one network. If you switch to another network, e.g. test network, the activation message appears again.
